modName: Less Annoying Sofia - No Bump Dialogue
summary: Normally, bumping into Sofia will make her play one of eight annoying lines. This mod gets rid of said lines.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][b][font=Verdana][color=#ff0000]Description[/color][/font][/b]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54527/]Sofia[/url]﻿ is one of my favorite followers, but she can get very annoying if you let her. I turned off her idle dialogue in her MCM, but one thing I couldn't turn off was her bumping dialogue. So if you bumped into her, 9 times out of 10 she would comment on it. And she's constantly on your heels, so hearing these lines is inevitable. This mod takes those lines and silences them.
That's all there is to it. Now onto some questions I know will be asked.

[b][font=Verdana][color=#ff0000]How do I install this mod?[/color][/font][/b]
If you're seriously asking this question, you should really read this [url=https://www.reddit.com/r/skyrimmods/wiki/beginners_guide]Beginner's Guide to Skyrim Modding[/url]. It will make your modding experience much more enjoyable, and stable.

[b][font=Verdana][color=#ff0000]Is this mod compatible with...?[/color][/font][/b]
This mod is just a sound replacer, it's compatible with everything.

[font=Verdana][color=#ff0000][b]What exactly are the lines that this mod gets rid of?[/b][/color][/font]
These lines play whenever your character bumps into Sofia. The exact lines are:
"Now, now. Calm yourself. I know I'm irresistible."
"I know you're excited to see me but perhaps you should wait for a more appropriate moment before trying to dive on top of me."
"You remind me of a dog I used to know. I had to always shake him off of me as well."
"Most people usually buy me a drink first."
"Wake up. Stop daydreaming about me and watch where you're going."
"This isn't one of those boy meets girl clichés is it?" (If your character is male)
"Is this your idea of girl on girl action? ...What? I heard someone say it. I'm not even sure what it means." (If your character is female)
"Oh, is there something hard in your pocket? I felt it when you brushed against me." (For some reason, this line is [i]not [/i]gender-dependent)

[b][font=Verdana][color=#ff0000]Why do the subtitles for the lines still show even though they're not playing?[/color][/font][/b]
Unfortunately, getting rid of subtitles would require an .esp file. The subtitles are just a minor annoyance, nothing I'd sacrifice a plugin slot to get rid of.

[font=Verdana][color=#ff0000][b]Do I need the "Loose Files" version of Sofia for this to work?[/b][/color][/font]
Yes, [i]unless[/i] you are using [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1334/]Mod Organizer[/url]﻿ (which I highly recommend you do) and are letting it handle .bsa files.

[b][font=Verdana][color=#ff0000]Will this mod work if Sofia is part of a merged mod?[/color][/font][/b]
Yes! But you may have to go into my mod's files and rename the "SofiaFollower.esp" [b]folder[/b] to whatever your merged .esp file is named.

[font=Verdana][color=#ff0000][b]I don't like Sofia.[/b][/color][/font]
Why are you here?[/size]
